title: SPACIOUS 3 BEDROOMS WITH GARAGES AVAILABLE NOW!!!
map_address: Silverado Ranch BLVD. near Pollock St.
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1339 Sq.
Milan Apartment Townhomes are ideally positioned in the best submarket of Las Vegas: Silverado Ranch/Henderson.
Our one, two, and three bedroom townhomes are between the affluent residential neighborhood of Seven Hills and downtown Las Vegas.

Residents of Milan enjoy convenient access to the entire Las Vegas Valley by way of the I-215 Beltway, which delivers rapid ingress to McCarran International Airport, the I-15, and the employment center better known as the "Strip."
Milan combines the convenience of city living with the comfort and security of homeownership.
Standard features include attached garages, washer/dryers, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closets, soaking tubs, and complete appliance packages.

Patio/Balcony, Disposal, Cable and Internet Ready, Microwave, 9-Foot Ceilings (1st floor) or Vaulted Ceilings (2nd floor), Extra Storage, Gas Range, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Efficient Appliances, Wheelchair Access, Electronic Thermostat, Pre Wired for Electronic Intrusion Alarm Systems, Newly Renovated Units, Oversized, Double-Pane Windows, View, Full Size Super Capacity GE Washers and Dryers, Heat-Glo Gas Fireplace, Central AC and Heat, Refrigerator, Corian Bath Vanities, Oversized Garden Tubs and Separate Shower Stall, 1 and 2 Car Direct Access Attached Garages (2 and 3 bedrooms), Granite Kitchen Countertops and Moen Kitchen/Bathroom Faucets, Walk-in Closets Available

Remote Access Community, Public Transportation, BBQ Areas and Picnic Pergolas, Package Receiving, Short-Term Lease, Garage, Clubhouse featuring a kitchen, fireplace, and cyber café with free WiFi, Recreation Room, Fitness Center, Courtesy Patrol, Resort-Style Pool, Business Center, High Speed Internet, Spa
Pets - allowed, Rent $30, Deposit $250 (refundable) Pet fee $250
